CustomField.formula: IF((ISPICKVAL( Account__r.Type,"Premier PBS Client")), IF(NOT(ISNULL( STO_Meeting__c )) ,1,0)+ IF(NOT(ISNULL( CC_Meeting__c )) ,1,0)+ IF(NOT(ISNULL( X1st_Invoice_Review__c )) ,1,0) + IF(NOT(ISNULL( HR_Assessment_Completed__c )) ,1,0)+ IF(NOT(ISNULL( Reference_Manual_Review__c )) ,1,0)+ IF(NOT(ISNULL( PEO_New_Client_Meeting__c )),1,0)+ IF(OR(NOT(ISNULL( HR_Action_Plan_Meeting__c )),NOT(ISNULL( COS_Meeting__c ))),1,0) , IF(NOT(ISNULL( STO_Meeting__c )) ,1,0)+ IF(NOT(ISNULL( CC_Meeting__c )) ,1,0)+ IF(NOT(ISNULL( X1st_Invoice_Review__c )) ,1,0) + IF(NOT(ISNULL( HR_Assessment_Completed__c )) ,1,0)+ IF(NOT(ISNULL( Reference_Manual_Review__c )) ,1,0))+ IF(OR(NOT(ISNULL( HR_Action_Plan_Meeting__c )),NOT(ISNULL( COS_Meeting__c ))),1,0)
CustomField.label: Onboarding Meeting Count
